summary: Simple wallpaper, gets the job done and looks great!
descriptionHtml:
This works[b] [color=#ff0000][size=3]ONLY[/size][/color][/b][color=#980000] [/color]in [color=#ff0000]16:9[/color] resolutions, it does not work under 4:3.

This is due by object acting as a plain, this removes the Skyrim Dragonborn logo or so replaces it with the object. I could resize it for 4:3 later in the future.

[color=#00ff00]Version 1.0.0.0 - Release[/color]

Added plain for texture placement.
Texture immersive game menu added.
Fog effects remain normal.

[b][color=#ffff00]WARNING:[/color][/b] This does not work with letterbox resolutions either, you may try but the fog system sometimes glitches the three-dimensional plain.

Enjoy!
author: Videogameget
